original: the Inquisitor
the Purifier
man at arm
spahi

You have not exactly been discreet as of late - frequent and often times blatant use of [Root.Society.GetName]'s powers without any concern for secrecy has caused the [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s to openly accuse you of apostasy!
translation: 截至最近你行事太不谨慎了——经常公然使用[Root.Society.GetName]的力量使得[Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]们公开指责你叛教！

original: Accused of Apostasy
Branded Apostate
This character has been accused of apostasy, whether or not the claim has any truth to it is another matter entirely...
translation: 这个家伙被指控犯下了叛教的大罪，至于罪名是否属实？那就是另一回事了……

original: Take this opportunity to get back at your rival and accuse [rival_target.GetHerHim] of apostasy. §Y[rival_target.GetBestName]§! might not be guilty - but your liege will be none the wiser either way...
translation: 抓住这个机会报复你的对手并且控告[rival_target.GetHerHim]叛教。§Y[rival_target.GetBestName]§!可能无罪——但是你的领主是无法明智判别的。

original: You bring §Y[accused_apostate.GetBestName]§! to the court of §Y[Root.Liege.GetTitle] [Root.Liege.GetFirstName]§!, [Root.Liege.GetSheHe] will decide the fate of the apostate!
translation: 你把§Y[accused_apostate.GetBestName]§!带到§Y[Root.Liege.GetTitle][Root.Liege.GetFirstName]§!的宫廷，[Root.Liege.GetSheHe]将决定叛教者的命运！

original: After taking statement from multiple witnessess and closely examining [accused_apostate.GetHerHis] every move, you have gathered enough damning evidence to accuse [accused_apostate.GetBestName] of apostasy - [accused_apostate.GetSheHe] has obviously sworn allegiance to [accused_apostate.Society.GetName]! Your [Root.GetReligionWarriorPlural] are poised and ready to bring [accused_apostate.GetHerHim] to you in chains.
translation: 在听取了多位目击者的证词，并且仔细观察了[accused_apostate.GetHerHis]一举一动之后，你已经收集到了足够的证据来指控[accused_apostate.GetBestName]是叛教者——[accused_apostate.GetSheHe]显然效忠于[accused_apostate.Society.GetName]！你的[Root.GetReligionWarriorPlural]已经准备就绪，随时可以将[accused_apostate.GetHerHim]捉拿归案。

original: After taking statement from multiple witnessess and closely examining [accused_apostate.GetHerHis] every move, you have managed to gather just enough evidence to accuse [accused_apostate.GetBestName] of apostasy - [accused_apostate.GetSheHe] has been consorting with [accused_apostate.Society.GetName]! Your [Root.GetReligionWarriorPlural] are poised and ready to bring [accused_apostate.GetHerHim] to you in chains.
translation: 在听取了众多目击者的陈述，以及对[accused_apostate.GetHerHis]一举一动的严格审查后。你已经设法收集到了足够的证据来证明[accused_apostate.GetFirstName]是一个叛教者，他加入了[accused_apostate.Society.GetName]！你的[Root.GetReligionWarriorPlural]已经准备就绪，随时可以将[accused_apostate.GetHerHim]捉拿归案。

original: While spying on [accused_apostate.GetBestName] you have found numerous heretical trinkets and books. All together you now have enough damning evidence to accuse [accused_apostate.GetHerHim] of apostasy - [accused_apostate.GetSheHeCap] claims to be a devout [accused_apostate.Religion.GetName], but [accused_apostate.GetSheHe] is obviously lying - [accused_apostate.GetSheHe] practices [accused_apostate.GetTrueReligionAdherent] in secrecy! Your [Root.GetReligionWarriorPlural] are poised and ready to bring [accused_apostate.GetHerHim] to you in chains.
translation: 在监视[accused_apostate.GetBestName]时你发现了数不清的异端饰品和书籍。现在你有足够的证据来指责[accused_apostate.GetHerHim]叛教。[accused_apostate.GetSheHeCap]称自己是虔诚的[accused_apostate.Religion.GetName]，但[accused_apostate.GetSheHe]明显在说谎。[accused_apostate.GetSheHe]在秘密地追随[accused_apostate.GetTrueReligionAdherent]！你的[Root.GetReligionWarriorPlural]已经备好，正准备将[accused_apostate.GetHerHim]锁拿到你的身边。

original: After taking statement from a few child witnessess and concerned peasants, you have gathered some evidence pointing towards [accused_apostate.GetBestName] being an apostate - you have a good feeling that [accused_apostate.GetFirstName]'s soul has been tainted by [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName]! Your [Root.GetReligionWarriorPlural] are poised and ready to bring [accused_apostate.GetHerHim] to you in chains.
translation: 在从一些儿童目击者和相关农民那里录完口供后，你已经收集到了一些指向[accused_apostate.GetBestName]是一个叛教者的证据——毫无疑问[accused_apostate.GetFirstName]的灵魂已经被[Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName]污染了！你的[Root.GetReligionWarriorPlural]已经做好了准备，随时可以将[accused_apostate.GetHerHim]缉拿到你面前。

original: After taking statement from a few child witnessess and concerned peasants, you have gathered some evidence pointing towards [accused_apostate.GetBestName] being an apostate - you have a good feeling about [accused_apostate.GetFirstName]'s soul being tainted by [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName]! Your [Root.GetReligionWarriorPlural] are poised and ready to bring [accused_apostate.GetHerHim] to you in chains.
translation: 在从一些儿童目击者和相关农民那里录完口供后，你已经收集到了一些指向[accused_apostate.GetBestName]是一个叛教者的证据——毫无疑问[accused_apostate.GetFirstName]的灵魂已经被[Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName]污染了！你的[Root.GetReligionWarriorPlural]已经做好了准备，随时可以将[accused_apostate.GetHerHim]缉拿到你面前。

original: Seize [accused_apostate.GetHerHim]! [accused_apostate.GetSheHeCap] will face [Root.Liege.GetTitle] [Root.Liege.GetFirstName]'s justice.
I know who I would rather accuse...
translation: 我知道我要指控哪个家伙……

original: [Root.GetLordSpiritualName] [Root.job_spiritual.GetFirstName] bursts into your [Root.GetChamber], flanked by several [Root.GetReligionWarriorPlural] dragging [accused_apostate.GetBestName] with them in chains. "My [Root.GetTitle], this [accused_apostate.GetManWoman] has been openly proclaiming [accused_apostate.GetHerHis] allegiance to [accused_apostate.Society.GetName]! What shall be done with [accused_apostate.GetHerHim]?"
translation: [Root.GetLordSpiritualName][Root.job_spiritual.GetFirstName]冲进了你的[Root.GetChamber]，身后的几位[Root.GetReligionWarriorPlural]拖拽着披枷带锁的[accused_apostate.GetBestName]。「尊贵的[Root.GetTitle]，这个[accused_apostate.GetManWoman]已经公开宣布对于[accused_apostate.Society.GetName][accused_apostate.GetHerHis]忠诚！我们要怎么处置[accused_apostate.GetHerHim]？」

original: [Root.GetLordSpiritualName] [Root.job_spiritual.GetFirstName] bursts into your [Root.GetChamber], flanked by several [Root.GetReligionWarriorPlural] dragging [accused_apostate.GetBestName] with them in chains. "My [Root.GetTitle], I have procured irrefutable evidence that this [accused_apostate.GetManWoman] consorts with [accused_apostate.Society.GetName]! What shall be done with [accused_apostate.GetHerHim]?"
translation: [Root.GetLordSpiritualName][Root.job_spiritual.GetFirstName]冲进了你的[Root.GetChamber]，身后的几位[Root.GetReligionWarriorPlural]拖拽着披枷带锁的[accused_apostate.GetBestName]。「尊贵的[Root.GetTitle]，我已经有足够的证据证明 [accused_apostate.GetManWoman]参与了[accused_apostate.Society.GetName]！我们该怎么处置[accused_apostate.GetHerHim]？」

original: [Root.GetLordSpiritualName] [Root.job_spiritual.GetFirstName] bursts into your [Root.GetChamber], flanked by several [Root.GetReligionWarriorPlural] dragging [accused_apostate.GetBestName] with them in chains. "My [Root.GetTitle], we caught this apostate in the act of reading [accused_apostate.TrueReligion.GetName] scripture, and giving praise to [Root.job_spiritual.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName]! What shall be done with [accused_apostate.GetHerHim]?"
translation: [Root.GetLordSpiritualName][Root.job_spiritual.GetFirstName]冲进了你的[Root.GetChamber]，身边跟着几个[Root.GetReligionWarriorPlural]拖着披枷带锁的[accused_apostate.GetBestName]。「我的[Root.GetTitle]，我们当场抓到这个叛教者阅读[accused_apostate.TrueReligion.GetName]，颂扬[Root.job_spiritual.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName]！我们应该怎么处理[accused_apostate.GetHerHim]？」

original: [Root.GetLordSpiritualName] [Root.job_spiritual.GetFirstName] bursts into your [Root.GetChamber], flanked by several [Root.GetReligionWarriorPlural] dragging [accused_apostate.GetBestName] with them in chains. "My [Root.GetTitle], there are many concerned peasants claiming that their children are plagued by nightmares of this [accused_apostate.GetManWoman] - [accused_apostate.GetSheHe] is obviously a [accused_apostate.GetWarlockWitch]! What shall be done with [accused_apostate.GetHerHim]?"
translation: [Root.GetLordSpiritualName][Root.job_spiritual.GetFirstName]冲进了你的[Root.GetChamber]，身后的几位[Root.GetReligionWarriorPlural]拖拽着披枷带锁的[accused_apostate.GetBestName]。「尊敬的[Root.GetTitle]，有很多忧虑的农民声称他们的孩子被这个[accused_apostate.GetManWoman]的噩梦所折磨——[accused_apostate.GetSheHe]显然是一个[accused_apostate.GetWarlockWitch]！我们该怎么处置[accused_apostate.GetHerHim]？」

original: [Root.GetLordSpiritualName] [Root.job_spiritual.GetFirstName] bursts into your [Root.GetChamber], flanked by several [Root.GetReligionWarriorPlural] dragging [accused_apostate.GetBestName] with them in chains. "My [Root.GetTitle], there are many concerned peasants claiming that their children are plagued by nightmares of this [accused_apostate.GetManWoman] - [accused_apostate.GetSheHe] is obviously a [accused_apostate.GetWarlockWitch]! What shall be done with [accused_apostate.GetHerHim]?"
translation: [Root.GetLordSpiritualName][Root.job_spiritual.GetFirstName]冲进了你的[Root.GetChamber]，身后的几位[Root.GetReligionWarriorPlural]拖拽着披枷带锁的[accused_apostate.GetBestName]。「尊敬的[Root.GetTitle]，有很多忧虑的农民声称他们的孩子被这个[accused_apostate.GetManWoman]的噩梦所折磨——[accused_apostate.GetSheHe]显然是一个[accused_apostate.GetWarlockWitch]！我们该怎么处置[accused_apostate.GetHerHim]？」

original: Burn the apostate!
Throw the apostate in the dungeon.
translation: 将这个叛教者关进地牢。

original: Bring out the branding iron!
Let [accused_apostate.GetHerHim] go free, what harm could it do?
translation: 给[accused_apostate.GetHerHim]自由吧，这能有什么害处呢？

original: Curse that damned [my_liege.GetLordSpiritualName], [my_liege.job_spiritual.GetFullName]! [my_liege.job_spiritual.GetSheHeCap] and [my_liege.job_spiritual.GetHerHis] posse of [my_liege.job_spiritual.GetReligionWarriorPlural] stormed into my [Root.GetChamber] and cast me in chains, accusing me of apostasy. Now [my_liege.GetBestName] has decided that I should be burned alive!
translation: 诅咒那个该死的[my_liege.GetLordSpiritualName][my_liege.job_spiritual.GetFullName]！[my_liege.job_spiritual.GetSheHeCap]带着一大群[my_liege.job_spiritual.GetHerHis][my_liege.job_spiritual.GetReligionWarriorPlural]冲进了我的[Root.GetChamber]，把我铐起来，指控我是个叛教者。现在[my_liege.GetBestName]决定把我活活烧死！

original: [accused_apostate.GetDWDevil], avenge me!
[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName], save my soul!

Curse that damned [my_liege.GetLordSpiritualName], [my_liege.job_spiritual.GetFullName]! [my_liege.job_spiritual.GetSheHeCap] and [my_liege.job_spiritual.GetHerHis] posse of [my_liege.job_spiritual.GetReligionWarriorPlural] stormed into my [Root.GetChamber] and cast me in chains, accusing me of apostasy. Now [my_liege.GetBestName] has decided that I am to rot away in [my_liege.GetHerHis] dungeon!
translation: 诅咒那个该死的[my_liege.GetLordSpiritualName][my_liege.job_spiritual.GetFullName]！[my_liege.job_spiritual.GetSheHeCap]带着一大群[my_liege.job_spiritual.GetHerHis][my_liege.job_spiritual.GetReligionWarriorPlural]冲进了我的[Root.GetChamber]，把我铐起来，指控我是个叛教者。现在[my_liege.GetBestName]决定让我烂在[my_liege.GetHerHis]地牢里！

original: I will be free, and then you will all pay!
translation: 等我自由后，你们都会为此付出代价！

original: Curse that damned [my_liege.GetLordSpiritualName], [my_liege.job_spiritual.GetFullName]! [my_liege.job_spiritual.GetSheHeCap] and [my_liege.job_spiritual.GetHerHis] posse of [my_liege.job_spiritual.GetReligionWarriorPlural] stormed into my [Root.GetChamber] and cast me in chains, accusing me of apostasy. Fortunately enough [my_liege.GetBestName] decided that I am to go free - though I will be branded as an apostate.
translation: 诅咒那该死的[my_liege.GetLordSpiritualName][my_liege.job_spiritual.GetFullName]！[my_liege.job_spiritual.GetSheHeCap]和[my_liege.job_spiritual.GetHerHis]一帮[my_liege.job_spiritual.GetReligionWarriorPlural]冲进了我的[Root.GetChamber]并用枷锁囚禁了我，指控我叛教。足够幸运的是[my_liege.GetBestName]决定放我自由——然而我将被打上叛教者的标签。

original: Fortunate, in a way.

Curse that damned [my_liege.GetLordSpiritualName], [my_liege.job_spiritual.GetFullName]! [my_liege.job_spiritual.GetSheHeCap] and [my_liege.job_spiritual.GetHerHis] posse of [my_liege.job_spiritual.GetReligionWarriorPlural] stormed into my [Root.GetChamber] and cast me in chains, accusing me of apostasy. Fortunately enough [my_liege.GetBestName] decided that I am to go free - [my_liege.GetFirstName] was evidently convinced of my innocence!
translation: 诅咒那该死的[my_liege.GetLordSpiritualName][my_liege.job_spiritual.GetFullName]！[my_liege.job_spiritual.GetSheHeCap]和[my_liege.job_spiritual.GetHerHis]一帮[my_liege.job_spiritual.GetReligionWarriorPlural]冲进了我的[Root.GetChamber]并用枷锁囚禁了我，指控我叛教。足够幸运的是[my_liege.GetBestName]决定放我自由——[my_liege.GetFirstName]相信我是清白的！

original: I walk free!

Disaster! Your fellow member of [Root.Society.GetName], [From.GetBestName], has been caught by [my_liege.GetLordSpiritualName] [my_liege.job_spiritual.GetFullName] and [my_liege.job_spiritual.GetHerHis] [my_liege.job_spiritual.GetReligionWarriorPlural]! They spared no time before they burned [From.GetHerHim] at the stake...
translation: 这真是灾难啊！一位同你一样在[Root.Society.GetName]的成员，[From.GetBestName]，已被[my_liege.GetLordSpiritualName][my_liege.job_spiritual.GetFullName]和[my_liege.job_spiritual.GetHerHis][my_liege.job_spiritual.GetReligionWarriorPlural]抓到了！他们毫不犹豫立刻把他[From.GetHerHim]烧死在了木架上……

original: Disaster! Your fellow member of [Root.Society.GetName], [From.GetBestName], has been caught by [my_liege.GetLordSpiritualName] [my_liege.job_spiritual.GetFullName] and [my_liege.job_spiritual.GetHerHis] [my_liege.job_spiritual.GetReligionWarriorPlural]! [From.GetSheHeCap] now rots away in [my_liege.GetTitle] [my_liege.GetFirstName]'s dungeon...
translation: 这真是灾难啊！一位同你一样在[Root.Society.GetName]的成员，[From.GetBestName]，已被[my_liege.GetLordSpiritualName][my_liege.job_spiritual.GetFullName]和[my_liege.job_spiritual.GetHerHis][my_liege.job_spiritual.GetReligionWarriorPlural]抓到了！[From.GetSheHeCap]现在在[my_liege.GetTitle][my_liege.GetFirstName]的地牢里等着烂掉……

original: Disaster! Your fellow member of [Root.Society.GetName], [From.GetBestName], has been caught by [my_liege.GetLordSpiritualName] [my_liege.job_spiritual.GetFullName] and [my_liege.job_spiritual.GetHerHis] [my_liege.job_spiritual.GetReligionWarriorPlural]! They used hot irons to brand [From.GetFirstName] an apostate, fortunately they spared [From.GetHerHis] life...
translation: 这真是灾难啊！一位同你一样在[Root.Society.GetName]的成员，[From.GetBestName]，已被[my_liege.GetLordSpiritualName][my_liege.job_spiritual.GetFullName]和[my_liege.job_spiritual.GetHerHis][my_liege.job_spiritual.GetReligionWarriorPlural]抓到了！他们用烧热的铁具在[From.GetFirstName]的身上烙上叛教者的标志，幸运的是他们饶恕了[From.GetHerHis]性命……

original: It is a sign for me to lay low...
Close the Gates
Open the Gates
Your vile pantheon of gods have no power here, [From.GetBestName]!
translation: [From.GetBestName]！你邪恶的伪神在这里根本无能为力！

original: Muslim
Convert County
Send emissaries from [From.Society.GetName] to the local population in order to convert them to the [From.Religion.GetName] faith.
translation: 将来自[From.Society.GetName]的使者派给当地居民，以便让他们皈依[From.Religion.GetName]信仰。

original: Enables §Gright-clicking§! the title shield of a county to convert the local population to your religion.
translation: 允许§G右击§!一个伯爵领头衔的盾徽，使当地居民皈依你的宗教。

original: A majority of the population in [From.GetName] has embraced the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith.

A courier is brought before me with a message, telling me that [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] has sent emissaries to [From.GetName] who have successfully managed to persuade the populace to embrace the [FromFrom.Religion.GetName] faith.
translation: 一个信使给我带来消息，告诉我说[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]派出多名使者前去[From.GetName]，在那里他们成功地说服了当地民众皈依[FromFrom.Religion.GetName]信仰。

original: Artifact Owner
Artifact Original Owner
During the transfer of power, $CHARACTER$ lost their $ARTIFACT$.
translation: 伴随着权力的交接，$CHARACTER$失去了$ARTIFACT$。

original: Send a letter to §Y[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]§! asking for permission to change the focus for the upbringing of §Y[Root.GetFirstName]§!. Focusing on §YHeritage§! will make §Y[Root.GetFirstName]§! adopt the Guardian's religion and culture.
translation: 给§Y[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]§!送一封信，请他允许你改变§Y[Root.GetFirstName]§!的教育重心。注意§Y传统§!的重心将使得§Y[Root.GetFirstName]§!接受监护人的宗教和文化。

original: Change the focus for the upbringing of §Y[Root.GetFirstName]§!. Focusing on §YHeritage§! will make §Y[Root.GetFirstName]§! adopt the Guardian's religion and culture.
translation: 改变§Y[Root.GetFirstName]§!的培养重心。重心设置为§Y传统§!会使§Y[Root.GetFirstName]§!接受监护者的宗教和文化。

original: Dear [Root.GetTitledNameWithNick],\n\nYour initiative to teach [FromFrom.GetFirstName] about Heritage is most welcome.
translation: 亲爱的[Root.GetTitledNameWithNick]，\n\n你关于[FromFrom.GetFirstName]传统教育的提议我求之不得。

original: [FromFrom.GetSubjectPronounCap] will be taught well.
Give Artifact
Gift §Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§! with an Artifact from your Treasury.
translation: 将你国库里的一件宝物赠给§Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§!

original: You can offer one of your Artifacts as a gift.
translation: 你可以用你的一件宝物作为礼物。

original: Select an Artifact to give - gratitude will vary depending on quality and significance to the recipient.
translation: 选择一件宝物作为礼物——对方感激的程度会随着宝物品质和对于收礼者的意义而变化。

original: Offer $ARTIFACT|Y$ as a gift to §Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§!, for §G+$OPINION$§! Opinion.
translation: 将$ARTIFACT|Y$作为礼物赠予§Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§!，增加 §G+$OPINION$§! 好感。

original: Offer $ARTIFACT|Y$ as a gift to §Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§!. §RThis will not increase [Recipient.GetPossPronoun] opinion of you further.§!
translation: 给予§Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§!$ARTIFACT|Y$作为礼物。§R但这并不能更进一步提高[Recipient.GetPossPronoun]对你的好感。§!

original: Artifact Gift Accepted
§Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§! accepted §Y[GetArtifactName]§! as a gift from §Y[Actor.GetBestName]§!.
Artifact Gift Declined
§Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§! declined §Y[Actor.GetBestName]§!'s gift of §Y[GetArtifactName]§!.
[Actor.GetBestName] is offering me a gift of [GetArtifactName].
Will you accept [GetArtifactName] as a humble gift?
translation: 这是[GetArtifactName]，一份薄礼，还请笑纳。

original: Select an Artifact
I accept your gracious gift. What a splendid object!
translation: 我会收下您的厚赠。真是一份美妙的礼物！

original: Gave me an Artifact
Quality
Savages have recently pillaged this Holding. The peasants are arming themselves, hell-bent on defending their homes.
translation: 该死的蛮子们最近洗劫了这片土地。农民们正在武装自己，准备拼命保卫自己的家园。

original: Frequent brutal raids by savages have left this land in a ravaged state.
translation: 蛮子们没完没了的洗劫和屠杀让这片土地一片荒芜。

original: Rampaging Horde
Hordes of rampaging savages are terrorizing the inhabitants of this county. If this county is conquered by a civilized character, the rampaging hordes will disperse.
translation: 成群的蛮族正在威胁这个地区的居民，如果一个开化的领主占领这一地区，那么就能驱逐这些蛮族部落。

original: Plundered by Savages
This county has been plundered by savages. For as long as this modifier remains, the county cannot be plundered again.

Magical Corruption
All power comes at a price. The use of dark magic has corrupted this character's body, making it frail and susceptible to disease.
translation: 天下没有白来的力量，黑暗魔法的滥用严重腐蚀了这个角色的肉体，使其变得孱弱不堪且对病魔毫无抵抗能力。

original: I knew power had its price, yet I never anticipated this...
translation: 我知道使用魔力有它的代价，但我从未想到这一点……

original: The corruption crept up on me so slowly - I did not realize what was happening to me before it was too late. Now the dark tendrils of [Root.GetDWDevil]'s magic has invaded my mind, sapping my energy and resolve. I am haunted by anxious thoughts and sleep eludes me.
translation: 黑暗力量渐渐腐蚀着我的身体——当我意识到的时候一切都已经太晚了。现在[Root.GetDWDevil]的黑暗卷须的魔力已经侵入了我的意识，腐蚀着我的精力和决心。我被焦虑的情绪弄得无法入睡。

original: I can feel it, it is inside of me! The mesmerizing voice, the sweet touch of my dark saviour! [Root.GetDWDevil]'s gift, the beautiful magic, is flowing freely through my veins. The sensation is dizzying, radiant, breathtaking. Nothing in the world can stop me now!
translation: 我感觉到了！祂在我灵魂深处！那迷人的声音……和深邃黑暗之救主的甜美触碰！这是[Root.GetDWDevil]的恩赐！魔力！汹涌的魔力在我的血管中搏动！这感觉，如此目眩，如此闪耀，激动人心！现在的我不可阻挡！

original: [Root.GetDWDevil]! Whisper your wishes in my ear and they shall come true!
translation: [Root.GetDWDevil]！在我耳边低语你的愿望，它们就会成真！

original: The use of dark magic has corrupted you.\n
translation: 黑暗魔法的使用已经腐蚀了你。\n

original: The corruption crept up on me so slowly - I did not realize what was happening to me before it was too late. The dark tendrils of [Root.GetDWDevil]'s magic has invaded my mouth and twisted around my tongue. As I attempt to speak, my words fail me, making social interaction awkward and the casting of spells tedious and draining.
translation: 黑暗力量渐渐腐蚀着我的身体——当我意识到的时候一切都已经太晚了。[Root.GetDWDevil]的黑暗魔法触须撬开了我的嘴唇，和我的舌头搅在一起。当我讲话的时候，我的遣词造句令人无法忍受，社交行为变得枯燥无味。

original: The corruption crept up on me so slowly - I did not realize what was happening to me before it was too late. What was first the lightest of limps has now turned into a hideous deformity. When I rub my sore, twisted ankles, I can feel the darkness pulsing just under my skin...
translation: 黑暗力量渐渐腐蚀着我的身体——当我意识到的时候一切都已经太晚了。一开始最轻的跛脚伤现在变成了一个可怕的畸形。当我摩擦我的脚踝扭伤时，我能感觉到皮肤下面黑暗力量的脉动……

original: The corruption crept up on me so slowly - I did not realize what was happening to me before it was too late. Little by little, my spine has curved itself forward, pushing my head down towards the ground. It is as if the dark magic has twisted me away from the heavens so that I am always facing [Root.GetDWDevil].
translation: 黑暗力量渐渐腐蚀着我的身体——当我意识到的时候一切都已经太晚了。逐渐地，我的脊柱向前弯曲，把头推向地面。仿佛黑暗魔法把我从天堂中撕扯下来，以便我能总是面对着[Root.GetDWDevil]。

original: The corruption crept up on me so slowly - I did not realize what was happening to me before it was too late. At first, I thought the lines and blotches on my face were a temporary consequence of too many nightly adventures and too little sleep. Now I barely recognize myself in the mirror.
translation: 黑暗力量渐渐腐蚀着我的身体——当我意识到的时候一切都已经太晚了。起初，我以为自己脸上的皱纹和斑点是因为进行过太多夜间冒险以至于缺乏睡眠的暂时性影响。现在我几乎认不出镜子里的自己了。

original: The corruption crept up on me so slowly - I did not realize what was happening to me before it was too late. Now the dark tendrils of [Root.GetDWDevil]'s magic has invaded my body, sapping my energy and causing all sorts of aches and ailments. I cannot remember the last day when I was not sniveling, coughing or retching.
translation: 黑暗力量渐渐腐蚀着我的身体——当我意识到的时候一切都已经太晚了。现在[Root.GetDWDevil]的黑暗魔法已经侵入我的身体，侵蚀我的活力，造成各种各样的疼痛和疾病。我记不起我最后一次不流涕，咳嗽或呕吐是多久以前了。

original: The corruption crept up on me so slowly - I did not realize what was happening to me before it was too late. Now the dark tendrils of [Root.GetDWDevil]'s magic has invaded my body, sapping my energy and causing all sorts of aches and ailments. No matter how long I sleep, I never feel quite rested.
translation: 黑暗力量渐渐腐蚀着我的身体——当我意识到的时候一切都已经太晚了。现在[Root.GetDWDevil]魔法的黑暗卷须已经侵入了我的身体，侵蚀我的活力并且造成各种各样的疼痛和疾病。无论睡了多久，我都感觉不到安适。

original: The corruption crept up on me so slowly - I did not realize what was happening to me before it was too late. Now the dark tendrils of [Root.GetDWDevil]'s magic has invaded my body, sapping all of my energy and strength. I often feel as if I am starving, yet I struggle to keep my food down...
translation: 黑暗力量渐渐腐蚀着我的身体——当我意识到的时候一切都已经太晚了。现在 [Root.GetDWDevil]的黑暗卷须的魔力已经侵入了我的身体，逐渐消耗了我全部的活力和力量。我经常觉得自己饥饿，但我尽量保持自己的食物储备……

translation: 花了些时间和[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]交谈后，我已经意识到我的错误，并使自己摆脱了罪恶。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] listened to me carefully as I explained to [From.GetHerHim] how to be more virtuous, and [From.GetSheHe] seems to have come out of our discussion a better [From.GetManWoman].
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]在我为[From.GetHerHim]讲解如何行善时听得非常专注，并且[From.GetSheHe]在和我的谈论之后似乎变成了更好的[From.GetManWoman]。

original: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] clearly explained how [From.GetSheHe] deals with this sometimes unforgiving and stressful life through virtue. Listening to [FromFrom.GetHerHim], I have learned to be more at peace with myself, by being more virtuous.
translation: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]清楚地解释了[From.GetSheHe]是如何行善以度过这时而无情且压力重重的生活的。通过倾听[FromFrom.GetHerHim]的讲述，我已了解如何通过行善以更好地修身养性。

original: Give Spiritual Guidance
You know [Root.GetTitledFirstName] to be a sinful person. As such you can provide spiritual guidance to help rid [Root.GetHerHim] of one of [Root.GetHerHis] vices.
translation: 你知道[Root.GetTitledFirstName]是一个罪人。所以你可以提供精神上的指导帮助[Root.GetHerHim]摆脱[Root.GetHerHis]一个恶习。

original: Enables you to §Gright-click§! on landed characters within your realm, or relatives, or fellow society members, in order to remove one of their vices. You can only remove a vice that you don't have yourself.
translation: 允许你§G右键点击§!领地中的有地角色或者你的亲戚、你的社团成员伙伴，来改掉他们的恶习。你只能移除你自己所不具备的恶习。

original: Received Spiritual Guidance
Has a sin that §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! does NOT have
Teach Virtue
You have noticed how [Root.GetTitledFirstName] sometimes struggles with doing the right thing. You could change that by teaching [Root.GetHerHim] one of your many virtues.
translation: 你注意到了[Root.GetTitledFirstName]有时很难做正确的事情。你可以通过教导[Root.GetHerHim]你众多美德之一来改变这一现象。

original: Enables you to §Gright-click§! on landed characters within your realm, relatives, or fellow society members, in order to give them a new virtue. You can only add a virtue that you have yourself.
translation: 允许你§G右键点击§!你的领地中的有地角色、你的亲戚或者你的社团成员同伴来赋予他们一种新的美德。你只能赋予你自己所具备的美德。

original: Taught a Virtue
Does NOT have all the virtues that §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! has

To [Root.GetTitledFirstName],
Your findings have proven to be most fascinating and I am now convinced to follow in your footsteps and immediately convert to the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith. However, I have chosen to keep this hidden to avoid prying eyes. I urge you to do the same!

Your liege, [From.GetTitledFirstName]
translation:
致[Root.GetTitledFirstName]，
你的发现已经证明是正确的，我现在立即跟随你的脚步并立即皈依[Root.Religion.GetName]信仰。不过，我选择秘密改信，以免隔墙有眼。我劝你也这么做！

你的领主，[From.GetTitledFirstName]

original: A wise decision.
To hide who I am? Never!
translation: 隐瞒我的真实身份？绝不！

original: Secretly Convert to [Root.Location.Religion.GetName]

The §Y[Root.Location.Religion.GetName]§! people in §Y[Root.Location.GetName]§! impress me with the depth and passion of their faith. The glory of §Y[Root.Location.Religion.GetRandomGodName]§! calls to me, and I am tempted to convert in secrecy...
translation: 我被§Y[Root.Location.GetName]§!深切并狂热信奉着§Y[Root.Location.Religion.GetName]§!的人民打动了。§Y[Root.Location.Religion.GetRandomGodName]§!的荣光呼唤着我，因此我产生了秘密皈依的念头……

original: Secretly Convert to [Root.Religion.GetName]
The §Y[Root.Religion.GetName]§! faith of §Y[Root.GetFirstName]§! intrigues and fascinates me. I could not embrace it openly, but I am tempted to convert in secrecy...
translation: §Y[Root.GetFirstName]§!信仰的§Y[Root.Religion.GetName]§!让我很是着迷。虽然我无法公开，但我可以秘密地改信……

original: Publicly follows the §Y[norse_pagan_reformed.GetName]§! religion
Publicly follows the §Y[baltic_pagan_reformed.GetName]§! religion
Publicly follows the §Y[finnish_pagan_reformed.GetName]§! religion
Publicly follows the §Y[slavic_pagan_reformed.GetName]§! religion
Publicly follows the §Y[tengri_pagan_reformed.GetName]§! religion
Publicly follows the §Y[west_african_pagan_reformed.GetName]§! religion
Publicly follows the §Y[zun_pagan_reformed.GetName]§! religion
Publicly follows the §Y[aztec_reformed.GetName]§! religion
This character practices the $RELIGION|Y$ religion in secret
translation: 这名角色私下里信奉着$RELIGION|Y$。

original: Knows that $WHO|Y$ secretly practices a religion
translation: 知道$WHO|Y$秘密信仰一个宗教

original: Does not know if $WHO|Y$ secretly practices a religion
translation: 无从知晓$WHO|Y$是否在秘密信仰一个宗教

original: Has Secret Religion
§YPossible to rank up in society§!
You have gained enough influence within your society that you can request promotion to the next rank.
translation: 在你的社团里你已经获得了足够的影响力，现在你可以要求升到下一位阶。

original: This character cannot currently assist you as they are busy with $WAR|Y$
translation: 这个角色目前无法帮助你，因为他正忙于$WAR|Y$

original: Abducted
Known Demon Worshiper
This character has been revealed as a worshiper of demons.
translation: 这个角色已经被揭露是一个恶魔的崇拜者。

original: [GetDemonHuntersEventTitle]
The Demon Slayer
The Return of the Slayer

Night has fallen as I contemplate my latest ritual – there has to be more efficient ways of washing blood off one's clothes...?\n'You must be the [Root.GetDWDemon]', a voice sounds behind me. I spin, only to find a sinister young woman, casually raising a wooden stake. Then she shrugs. 'I can't let evil like you just walk around'.
translation: 夜幕降临，我在思索着最近进行的仪式——应该还有更有效的方法来洗去衣服上的血……？\n「你就是[Root.GetDWDemon]吧。」一个声音在我身后响起。我转身，发现一个危险的少妇，举着一个木桩。她耸耸肩：「我不能让你这种邪恶的东西就这么走开。」

original: As I retire to my quarters for the night, I am startled by a shadow, suddenly moving. 'It's been a while', a bright voice muses as a woman steps into the light, weapon raised. 'How did you get into my [Root.GetCapitalHolding]?', I demand to know, but my voice betrays my brave act. 'Your guards are sleeping, my [Root.GetLordLady]... Let's finish this'.
translation: 当我晚上回到我的住处时，一个影子突然动了起来，吓了我一跳。「真是让我久等了。」一个明亮的声音响起。声音的主人，是一名举着武器的女子，她缓缓的走出了阴影。「你是怎么进入我的[Root.GetCapitalHolding]里的？」我问道，略带一丝紧张与不安。「你的守卫都睡着了，我的[Root.GetLordLady]……让我们做个了断吧。」

original: The Angry Villagers
The Angry Villagers Return

After having snuck out for a late walk with my pet familiar, I make my way back through the gates of [Root.Capital.Capital.GetName]. Suddenly, shadows surround me and I'm shoved into a wall. A group of angry villagers, their expressions dark in the light of their torches, has gathered around me. Someone yells: 'burn [Root.GetHerHim]!'
translation: 晚上偷偷遛完我的宠物后，我回到了[Root.Capital.Capital.GetName]的大门口。突然，一群人影包围住了我，我被推在墙上。火把下，愤怒的村民们表情忽明忽暗。他们聚拢过来，有人大声喊着：「烧了[Root.GetHerHim]！」

original: I am moving quietly through the gates into the [Root.GetCapitalHolding] tonight, grateful for my disguise. Specific rituals sometimes require me to blend in amongst the common folk. It's become almost second nature – my [GetDWPartyClothes] would be quite the giveaway!\n'There [Root.GetSheHe] is!' someone yells. 'BURN [Root.GetHerHim]!'
translation: 今夜，我乔装打扮，悄悄来到了[Root.GetCapitalHolding]的大门口。特定的仪式有时需要我融入平民百姓之中，这几乎成了第二天性。我的[GetDWPartyClothes]将会是最好的赠品！\n「找到[Root.GetSheHe]了！」一个人突然喊着，「烧了[Root.GetHerHim]！」

original: The Demon Hunters
The Return of the Demon Hunters

Having just performed a ritual requiring the full moon, it's past midnight when I sneak back into my quarters. Satisfied, I begin washing the blood off my hands. Behind me, someone clears their throat. 'Not so fast, you evil [Root.GetDWDemon]'. I feel the tip of a sword in my back. Another voice mutters: 'Just kill it, brother'.
translation: 当我进行完需要满月的仪式并潜回自己的住处时，已经过了午夜。我满意地开始用水清洗着双手。在我身后，有人清了清自己的喉咙。「别这么快，你这邪恶的[Root.GetDWDemon]」。我能感觉到有剑尖抵在我的背上。另一个声音轻声道：「老哥，别废话，杀了它。」

original: In honor of [GetDWRandomDemon], I've just finished a new blood ward on my wall. The flickering candlelight makes the intricate pattern glisten, and I back away to admire my art. Suddenly, two shadows grow on the wall, looming over me... The tallest one says, nonchalantly: 'I told you we'd get another shot, brother'.
translation: 为了向[GetDWRandomDemon]致敬，我刚在墙上完成了一个新的血液法阵。烛光摇曳，复杂的图案闪闪发光，我退后两步以便更好的欣赏我的艺术品。突然，墙上出现了两个影子，渐渐向我逼近……最高的一个影子漫不经心地说：「我告诉过你我们会再来一次的，兄弟。」

original: The Demon Hunter
The Return of the Demon Hunter

In the middle of one of our more carnal rituals, my fellow [Root.GetSocietyRank] suddenly gasps in surprise: 'Did you invite someone else?' Before I have time to reply, a torch is thrown to the floor, sparks singeing my skin. 'We've become [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]'s madmen, all of us', a darkly clad figure says. 'Die, you demon!'
translation: 在我们的一次更加肉欲化的仪式中，我的同伴[Root.GetSocietyRank]突然倒抽了一口气，惊讶地问：「你还请了别人？」我还没来得及回答，一支火把被扔到了地板上，燎伤了我的皮肤。「我们是[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]的狂热者，我们都是，」一个黑影中的人说，「去死吧，你这恶魔！」

original: I still have nightmares about the mysterious demon hunter I once encountered. These days, while I haven't been covering my tracks, the stench of my foul deeds travels further than ever before... Staring at the ceiling in my room, the moonlight suddenly goes out. Leaning over me is a man, weapon raised. 'We meet again'.
translation: 我仍然会做关于我曾经遇到的那个神秘猎魔人的噩梦。这些天，在我还没有掩盖住自己的踪迹时，我所作恶事的遗臭传的比以前更远了……我盯着我房间里的天花板，这时月光突然消失了。一个人举着武器，对着我说，「我们又见面了。」

original: An Affront to [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]
Still an Affront to [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]

I'm not sure what my steward was thinking, letting in a group of holy knights to our [Root.GetCapitalHolding]. They know. Everyone knows! What I am, what I can do... When night falls, I'm not surprised to find myself backed into a dark alley, surrounded by them. 'All [GetDWDemons] must die...!', they cry, riling each other up.
translation: 我不知道我的财政总管在想什么，竟然让一批圣骑士进入我们的[Root.GetCapitalHolding]。他们知道了，每个人都知道了！我是谁，我该做什么……夜幕降临，我被人们包围，逼进了一个漆黑的小巷。「所有的[GetDWDemons]都必须死！」愤怒的人群吼道。

original: Out surveying my lands, accompanied by a small entourage of servants, I notice a huge cloud of dust being stirred up on the road up ahead... My servants begin to shout and scramble about, as we see a group of knights charging at us – their banner, clearly that of the demon hunting cohort I barely escaped before...
translation: 在一小群随从的陪同下我去勘察土地，我注意到在前面的路上尘土激昂……我的仆人们开始大喊大叫，因为我们看到一群骑士正在向我们冲锋？！他们的旗帜，显然是我之前差点没逃过的猎魔大队……

original: What is the meaning of this? By [GetDWDevil], I will fight you!
translation: 这是什么意思？以[GetDWDevil]之名，我会战胜你！

original: You're stubborn! By [GetDWDevil], I will still fight you!
translation: 你真顽强！以[GetDWDevil]之名，我还是会战胜你！

original: You have no idea who are you are dealing with...!
translation: 你完全没意识到你在对付谁……！

original: You pull out your enchanted dagger and jam it into your leg, where you have engraved the emergency symbol.\n
translation: 你拔出你的魔法匕首并把它插进自己的腿里，在那里你刻上了紧急标志。\n

original: Your attacker staggers away in shock.\n
Your attackers stagger away in shock.\n
Then again, perhaps you could? For a price?
translation: 又来了，你们或许可以？谈个价钱？

original: Let's not be hasty...! We can sort this out, with gold?
translation: 不要轻举妄动……！我们可以用黄金来解决这个问题？

original: Woah, woah... Let's be civilized... You seem like businessmen!
translation: 哇、哇……我们文明一点……你看起来像一个商人！

original: I don't suppose you'd be willing to walk out of here, a rich man?
translation: 我不认为你有钱到愿意空手离开这里。

original: But I'm a rich [Root.GetDWDemon]! Let's make a deal.
translation: 但我是一个富有的[Root.GetDWDemon]！让我们做个交易吧。

original: No, w-wait, let's talk about it! Is it money you want?
translation: 不，等、等一等，我们来谈谈吧！你想要钱吗？

original: Oh, come on... N-not again. Let's talk about this!
translation: 哦，天哪……又来这套。我们来谈谈这个！

original: You two again...! How about we sort this out with money?
translation: 又是你们两个……！我们用钱解决怎么样？

original: H-how about I line your pockets with more gold than you can carry?
translation: 我——我把你的钱包装到你拿不动怎么样？

original: I'm still a rich [Root.GetDWDemon]! Let's talk about gold!
translation: 我还是一个富有的[Root.GetDWDemon]！我们来谈谈钱的事情吧！

original: W-wait! I can give you names! Track down [other_member_to_blame.GetSocietyRank] [other_member_to_blame.GetFirstName] instead!
translation: 等……等等！我可以给你名单！去抓[other_member_to_blame.GetSocietyRank][other_member_to_blame.GetFirstName]吧，饶过我！

original: You pray to [GetDWDevil] that your personal combat skill will save you.\n
translation: 你向[GetDWDevil]祈祷，祈求你的个人实战能力可以救你一命。\n

original: In a moment of desperation, you betray your coven.\nThis will increase suspicion of §Y[other_member_to_blame.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n
translation: 在一个绝望的时刻，你背叛了你的秘社。\n这将增加§Y[other_member_to_blame.GetTitledFirstName]§!的怀疑。\n

original: You reach for your money, attempting to bribe your way out.\n
translation: 你把手伸向钱，试图给自己谋求出路。\n

original: you getting badly injured\n
you getting killed in personal combat\n
the woman rolling her eyes at you, before killing you\n
translation: 在杀死你之前，那个女人朝你翻了白眼\n

original: them laughing at your offer, before dragging you off to be burnt at the stake\n
translation: 他们嘲笑了你的提议，然后把你拖到火堆上烧死了\n

original: the demon hunter ignoring your offer, before killing you slowly\n
translation: 猎魔人无视你的提议，然后将你折磨致死。\n

original: them being defeated, leaving you alone for now\n
translation: 他们被击溃，留下你一个人\n

original: them accepting your offer, leaving you alone for now\n
translation: 他们接受你的提议，留下你一个人\n

original: One of my hunting parties caught a great white boar today. [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] must have sent us this creature, as it took ten men to bring the beast down, and the effect it has had on my soldiers is clearly the boon I have been waiting for. 'Bards are already composing songs, my [Root.GetLordLady]', a captain tells me.
translation: 今天，我们的猎人抓住了一只大白野猪。定然是[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]将此物赠与吾等，把它搬走要花十个人的力气，而此事对我的士兵的影响，正是我祈求至今的恩泽。「吟游诗人们已经开始为此写诗作赋了，我的[Root.GetLordLady]。」一个队长说。

original: One of my hunting parties caught a great white boar today. I am told it took ten men to bring the beast down, and rumors of the effect it has had on my soldiers is already spreading through court. 'Bards are already composing songs, my [Root.GetLordLady]', a captain tells me. This certainly goes against my expectations...
translation: 我们的狩猎队在今天抓到了一只大白猪，他们说要十个人才能把这头野兽搬走，我的士兵已经在朝廷内外传播这件事情了，「吟游诗人已经开始写曲子了，我的[Root.GetLordLady]」，一个队长告诉我。这显然与我的初衷不同……

original: I am not sure whether it is a new-found interest in [envisioned_friend.GetEducationSubject], or if there is something about [envisioned_friend.GetHerHis] [envisioned_friend.GetFriendEnjoyableQuirk], but I am really connecting with [envisioned_friend.GetTitledFirstName]. We have been spending more and more time together, and I think [envisioned_friend.GetSheHe] makes me a better [Root.GetTitle].
translation: 我不确定究竟是因为我们在[envisioned_friend.GetEducationSubject]中新发现的兴趣，或者是因为[envisioned_friend.GetHerHis][envisioned_friend.GetFriendEnjoyableQuirk]，但我已经真的与[envisioned_friend.GetTitledFirstName]建立了不少关系。我们在一起度过的时间越来越多，而且我认为[envisioned_friend.GetSheHe]让我成为了一个更好的[Root.GetTitle]。

original: I am told of an owl having taken up residence under the roofing of our barracks. One of my advisors suggest I make it a pet. But should not my scrying have revealed the symbol of wisdom to me, if this creature is what it was about? 'Do not dwell on this, [Root.GetMasterMistress]', my steward says, handing me the caged bird.
translation: 据说有只猫头鹰栖身在我们营房的屋顶下。我的一个顾问建议我把它养作宠物。但如果正如占卜所说，那么这个生物岂不正是……？「别瞎寻思了，[Root.GetMasterMistress]。」我的管家说着，将已经在笼中的鸟递给了我。

original: How did I not foresee this event?
translation: 我怎么没有预见到这个事？

original: Proud Hunting Parties
The hunters in the area, and the success they have brought, are currently working as an inspiration for nobles and commoners alike.
translation: 这个区域的猎人们所带来的成功正在鼓舞着当地的贵族和平民。

original: subtle way with words
love of poetry
fascination with plants
morbid sense of humor
gentle spirit
way of making me really consider what makes a good person
translation: 让我认真思考怎样做一个好人的方式

original: mischievous sense of humor
way of challenging me to think outside of the box
translation: 激励我不走寻常路的方法

original: infectious smile
taste in music
appreciation for the small things in life
optimistic outlook on life
innocence
jaded view of romance
way of cracking [This.GetHerHis] knuckles
fighting spirit
sharp wit
Go away! I do not have a moment to spare.
A Cleansing Through Fire

During a discussion with some fellow lay members of [This.Society.GetName], I mention the dusty old tomes I store in the library of [Root.Capital.Capital.GetName]. 'Most of the content is hardly intelligible!', I scoff. The eyes of my peers widen. 'One should not take writings of [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName] so lightly, my [Root.GetLordLady]'.
translation: 在一场来自[This.Society.GetName]在俗会员的伙伴们的讨论中，我提及了那些储藏在[Root.Capital.Capital.GetName]图书馆里的落满灰尘的书。「里面大多数内容几乎无法理解」，我嘲笑道。我的同僚们睁大了眼睛。「[Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName]的作品可不应该这么轻率地对待，我的[Root.GetLordLady]」。

original: Hrm... I shall see to it that the most dangerous ones are destroyed.
translation: 呣……我保证之后会毁掉最危险的那些。

original: You misunderstand! I am getting rid of the book, tonight.
translation: 你们误会了！今晚我就会把书扔了。

original: I have actually been arranging for several tomes to be burned!
translation: 事实上我已经准备要烧掉几本！

original: Actually, I shall cleanse my whole [Root.GetCapitalHolding] of these accursed objects.
translation: 实际上，我要把这些可恶的东西从我的整个[Root.GetCapitalHolding]中清除掉。

original: This all sounds a bit excessive.
On the other hand, all knowledge can be valuable.
translation: 另一方面，所有的知识都是有价值的。

original: An Dusty Old Tome
As I retire for the night, I glance at my nightstand... It looks almost as if there is a... There's a thick leather-bound tome, placed right by my bed. What is the meaning of this?
translation: 当我晚上休息时，我瞥了一眼床头柜……看起来好像有一个……有一个厚厚的皮革制品，放在我的床边。这是什么意思？

original: You throw the book out, ordering it burned.\n
translation: 你把书扔出去，命令烧掉它。\n

original: I am fairly certain I got rid of this thing...
translation: 我很确定我已经处理掉了这个东西……

original: How long has that been there?
You scratch your head.\n
Secretly Convert to Catholic
The §YCatholic§! pilgrims that flock to the holy site in §Y[Root.Location.GetName]§! impress me with the depth and passion of their faith. I am tempted to convert in secrecy...
translation: 聚集在圣地§Y[Root.Location.GetName]§!的§Y天主教§!朝圣者们对他们信仰的深度与热情打动了我。我被吸引着秘密改信……

original: Secretly Convert to Orthodox
The §YOrthodox§! pilgrims that flock to the holy site in §Y[Root.Location.GetName]§! impress me with the depth and passion of their faith. I am tempted to convert in secrecy...
translation: 聚集在圣地§Y[Root.Location.GetName]§!的§Y东正教§!朝圣者们对他们信仰的深度与热情打动了我。我被吸引着秘密改信……
